title: [Cancer] Ancient Aboriginal bush medicine could improve modern day cancer treatment, study shows. The substance appears to inhibit cancer cells ability to defend themselves against chemotherapy. It was tested against cells resistant to SN-38, a drug used to fight aggressive lung cancer and colon cancer.

[Health] Vegetarians who eat more processed foods are at higher risk of developing depression, a new study finds. Those with diets high in fresh fruit, vegetables, nuts, seeds, legumes & whole grains were found to be at lower risk of depression compared to fellow vegans & vegetarians with low quality diets.
